original_text: The leaders of the priests and teachers of God's Law saw all the powerful things that Jesus did. They also saw children in the yard of the temple who were shouting, ‘Welcome! We pray that God will be good to you, Son of David!’ All these things caused the important Jews to become very angry.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 서기관들이 예수께서 하시는 이상한 일과 또 성전에서 소리 질러 호산나 다윗의 자손이여 하는 어린이들을 보고 노하여

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and teachers of God's Law
saw all the powerful things that Jesus did
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 행하신 모든 놀라운 일들을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They also saw children in the yard of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 성전 뜰에 있는 아이들을 보았다

sentences.original_text: We pray that God will be good to you
caused the important Jews to become very angry
